items.title: Captain guilty of North Sea tanker crash death
items.description: Vladimir Motin is convicted of gross negligence manslaughter after a crew member died in the crash.

items.title: Ukraine hails 'real results' after Musk restricts Russian Starlink use
items.description: Starlink-enabled drones have been linked to a number of recent deadly attacks by Russia on Ukraine.

items.title: Fifa president Infantino apologises for jokes about British fans
items.description: Fifa president Gianni Infantino apologises for controversial comments he made about British football supporters which were criticised by fan groups.

items.title: Steve Wright - the 'cruel' serial killer who hated women
items.description: Steve Wright's admission that he murdered Victoria Hall confirms he killed six women over a seven-year period.

items.title: Scottish government confirms it will not back prostitution offences bill
items.description: Independent MSP Ash Regan's bill would make it a criminal offence to pay for sex in Scotland.
